summary: During the economic boom of Italy a man tries desperately to maintain a high standard of living for his family.
cast: Alberto Sordi|Gianna Maria Canale|Elena Nicolai|Ettore Geri|Mariolina Bovo|Gloria Cervi|Sandra Verani|Sandro Merli|Antonio Mambretti|Alceo Barnabei|Ugo Silvestri|Maria Grazia Buccella|Federico Giordano|Franco Abbina|Matelda Scotti|Silvio Battistini|John Karlsen|Alfio Vita|Mario Cipparone|Gino Pasquarelli|Vittorio Casella|Rosetta Biondi|Angelo Casadei|Felicita Tranchina|Alfredo Zambuto
title: El especulador
